A1.name: Enhance TodoWrite Tool
A1.description: Implement automatic git commit functionality when tasks are marked as completed
verification_steps: TodoWrite tool successfully created with GitManager integration
Automatic git commit functionality tested and working
Task completion triggers structured commit messages
Push to remote repository implemented with error handling
A1.next_task_info: Create integration documentation and test with Agent-OS

A2.name: Agent-OS Workflow Integration
A2.description: Create an Agent-OS workflow to demonstrate and test the TodoWrite tool's integration.
verification_steps: Task creation and completion within workflow is successful
Automatic git commit triggered by workflow is verified

MANUAL_TEST_001.name: Verify TodoWrite Tool Manually
MANUAL_TEST_001.description: This task is created to manually verify the functionality of the TodoWrite tool and its Git integration.
